name: Mystic Forest (Shubham chandurkar)
description:
Mystic Forest is all about a player who is trapped in a forest, now he has to stay alive by killing the forest creatures and do sacrifices to the goddess when needed. Try to be alive and score as much as you can. The goddess is responsible for keeping all-natural forces active but sometimes she fails. 

Controls: 

Right key(A) - Left key(D) = To move

Up key(W) = To jump

Mouse Left Button = To shoot

!!!!! Made for Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice !!!!!

Comment down your highest score :)

Note: This is my first game (Prototype) and first game jam, hope you enjoy the game. Suggestions are appreciated. Thank You!
